chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
aecfli: append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
lltsi: leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface
olpti: one_leader_per_term_interface

Goal:
forall (ps : list packet) (st st' : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), appendEntries_leader_predicate ps st -> type_term_log_monotonic st st' -> appendEntries_leader_predicate ps st'

Premises:
Record one_leaderLog_per_term_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_one_leaderLog_per_term_interface { one_leaderLog_per_term_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term net; one_leaderLog_per_term_log_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term_log net; one_leaderLog_per_term_host_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leaderLog_per_term_host net } Arguments one_leaderLog_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_one_leaderLog_per
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive serverType : Set := Follower : serverType | Candidate : serverType | Leader : serverType
Record append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface { append_entries_came_from_leaders_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> append_entries_came_from_leaders net } Arguments append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_append_entries_came_from_leaders_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
term = nat : Set
Record leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface { leaderLogs_term_sanity_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_term_sanity net; leaderLogs_currentTerm_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity net; leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_currentTerm_sanity_candidate net } Arguments leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_term_s
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record one_leader_per_term_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_one_leader_per_term_interface { one_leader_per_term_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leader_per_term net } Arguments one_leader_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_one_leader_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
type_term_log_monotonic = fun st st' : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output => type st' = Leader -> type st = Leader /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ (forall e : entry, In e (log st) -> In e (log st')) : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> Prop
logIndex = nat : Set
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
clientId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (_, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in clientId : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments clientId {orig_base_params RaftParams}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
handleRequestVoteReply_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (h' : name) (r : bool) (st' : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), type st' = Candidate -> handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r = st' -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st
matchIndex_preserved = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (st st' : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => type st' = Leader -> type st = Leader /\ matchIndex st' = matchIndex st /\ log st' = log st : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> Prop Arguments matchIndex_preserved {orig_base_params raft_params}
applied_entries_log_lastApplied_update_same : forall (sigma : name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), log st = log (sigma h) -> lastApplied st = lastApplied (sigma h) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = applied_entries sigma
handleAppendEntriesReply_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (n : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply h st n t es r = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' = Follower
applied_entries_safe_update : forall (sigma : name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), lastApplied st = lastApplied (sigma h) -> removeAfterIndex (log st) (lastApplied (sigma h)) = removeAfterIndex (log (sigma h)) (lastApplied (sigma h)) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = applied_entries sigma
matchIndex_preserved_except_at_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (h : name) (st st' : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => type st' = Leader -> type st = Leader /\ (forall h' : name, h <> h' -> assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex st') h' 0 = assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex st) h' 0) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> Prop Arguments matchIndex_preserved_except_at_host {orig_base_params raft_params}
handleClientRequest_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> ps = [] /\ (log st' = log st \/ (exists e : entry, log st' = e :: log st /\ eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log st)) /\ eTerm e = currentTerm st /\ eClient e = client /\ eInput e = c /\ eId e = id /\ type st = Leader))
handleAppendEntriesReply_same_term_votedFor_preserved : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply h st h' t es r = (st', ms) -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st -> votedFor st' = votedFor st
handleRequestVote_type_term : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower /\ currentTerm st' >= currentTerm st
handleRequestVoteReply_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r = st' -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower /\ currentTerm st' > currentTerm st \/ type st = Candidate /\ type st' = Leader /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st
handleRequestVote_type : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (h' : fin N) (t lli llt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' lli llt = (st', m) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower
handleRequestVote_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t c li lt = (st', m) -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' = Follower
handleAppendEntriesReply_type_term : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply h st h' t es r = (st', ms) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower /\ currentTerm st' >= currentTerm st
handleAppendEntriesReply_type : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply h st h' t es r = (st', ms) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower
handleRequestVoteReply_spec : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ type st' <> Candidate) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true)
applyEntries_spec : forall (es : list entry) (h : name) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data), applyEntries h st es = (os, st') -> exists (d : data) (cc : list (clientId * (nat * output))), st' = RaftState.set_raft_data_clientCache term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_stateMachine term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output st d) cc
handleRequestVoteReply_spec' : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r -> log st' = log st /\ (forall v : name, In v (votesReceived st) -> In v (votesReceived st')) /\ (type st <> Leader /\ type st' = Leader -> (type st = Candidate /\ wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived st')) = true) /\ r = true /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ currentTerm st = t /\ votesReceived st' = h' :: votesReceived st)
advanceCurrentTerm_term : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat), currentTerm st <= t -> currentTerm (advanceCurrentTerm st t) = t
doGenericServer_log_type_term_votesReceived : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), doGenericServer h st = (os, st', ps) -> log st' = log st /\ type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ votesReceived st' = votesReceived st /\ votedFor st' = votedFor st
handleTimeout_log_term_type : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h st = (out, st', ps) -> log st' = log st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st /\ type st' = type st \/ currentTerm st' = S (currentTerm st)
handleRequestVoteReply_currentTerm : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (x : nat), x <= currentTerm st -> x <= currentTerm (handleRequestVoteReply h st h' t r)
update_elections_data_net = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me src : name) (m : msg) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => match m with | RequestVote t _ lastLogIndex lastLogTerm => update_elections_data_requestVote me src t src lastLogIndex lastLogTerm st | RequestVoteReply t voteGranted => update_elections_data_requestVoteReply me src t voteGranted st | AppendEntries t lid prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit => update_elections_data_appendEntries me st t lid prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit | AppendEntriesReply _ _ _ => fst st end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), name -> name -> msg ->...-> electionsData Arguments update_elections_data_net {orig_base_params raft_params}
handleAppendEntries_same_term_votedFor_preserved : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st -> votedFor st' = votedFor st

handleAppendEntries_type : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Follower
advanceCurrentTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (newTerm : nat) => if currentTerm state <? newTerm then RaftState.set_raft_data_leaderId term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_votedFor term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_currentTerm term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state newTerm) None) Follower) None else state : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> nat -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output...
handleRequestVoteReply_matchIndex : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (v : bool), type (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = Leader -> type st = Leader /\ matchIndex (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = matchIndex st \/ assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v)) n 0 = maxIndex (log (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v))
send_packets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (src : Net.name) (ps : list (Net.name * Net.msg)) => map (fun m : Net.name * Net.msg => {| pSrc := src; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), Net.name -> list (Net.name * Net.msg) -> list packet Arguments send_packets {P params} _ _%list_scope /
update_elections_data_requestVoteReply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me src : name) (t : nat) (voteGranted : bool) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => let st' := handleRequestVoteReply me (snd st) src t voteGranted in match type st' with | Follower => fst st | Candidate => {| votes := votes (fst st); votesWithLog := votesWithLog (fst st); cronies := fun tm : term => if Nat.eq_dec tm (currentTerm st') then votesReceived st' else cronies (fst st) tm; leaderLogs := leaderLogs (fst st); allEntries := allEntries (fst st) |} | Leader => {| votes := votes (fst st); votesWithLog := votesWithLog (fst st); cronies := fun tm : term => if Nat.eq_dec...
getNextIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) => assoc_default name_eq_dec (nextIndex state) h (maxIndex (log state)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> name -> logIndex Arguments getNextIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}

doLeader_type : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st

handleTimeout_type_strong : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h st = (out, st', l) -> type st' = type st /\ currentTerm st' = currentTerm st \/ type st' = Candidate /\ currentTerm st' = S (currentTerm st)
